mapper.select: SELECT chat_msg chatMsg , msg.create_date createDate , cr.chat_room_no chatRoomNo , wm.work_member_name workMemberName FROM chat_msg msg INNER JOIN chat_member cm ON msg.chat_member_no = cm.chat_member_no INNER JOIN chat_room cr ON cr.chat_room_no = cm.chat_room_no INNER JOIN workspace_member wm ON chat_member_email = work_member_email WHERE wm.work_no = #{workNo} AND msg.chat_member_no IN ( SELECT chat_member_no FROM chat_member WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} )
